meanings.definition: The act of smoothing or shaping a surface with a plane.
meanings.sent1: The planing of the wood made it smooth to touch.
meanings.sent2: I watched the carpenter's planing of the table to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The planing of the cake with frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her gentle planing of the clay created a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The planing of the ice sculpture revealed intricate details.

meanings.definition: The process of removing material from a surface using a plane.
meanings.sent1: The planing of the door removed the old paint effectively.
meanings.sent2: He demonstrated the proper technique for planing the wood smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The planing of the cheese resulted in thin, even slices.
meanings.sent4: The planing of the metal sheet produced a shiny finish.
meanings.sent5: Her planing of the marble revealed its natural beauty.

meanings.definition: The act of traveling on a plane.
meanings.sent1: Our planing to Europe was a smooth and enjoyable journey.
meanings.sent2: The planing to the tropical island was filled with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The planing to the moon seemed like a dream come true.
meanings.sent4: Their planing to the ski resort was met with fresh snowfall.
meanings.sent5: The planing to the concert was a thrilling experience.
